Update.Config.Url.Description.other: Http URL of the update server

Update.Config.PublicKey.Description.other: Official key used to verify binaries signature.

Update.Config.Channel.Description.other: Channel used for requesting for updates. Stick to Stable if you are not sure.

Update.Config.ProxyHost.Description.other: Host of a proxy server if required for outbound connections

Update.Config.ProxyPassword.Description.other: Password for the proxy server identification
